title: whitegold22
author: whitegold22
content: As the subject states. I need someone to very a crypto account for me. Telegram me if you are interested. Any Kenyan person and European person is fine

comments.author: cryptoperkele
comments.body: Yeah, help this person if you want your ID to be associated and in middle of money laundering, criminal investigation, linked to hackers, getting all of your CEX accounts and money seized. You might not want to do it for pocket money that you will lose anyway.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: whitegold22 on August 12, 2022, 10:30:14 AMAs the subject states. I need someone to very a crypto account for me. Telegram me if you are interested. Any Kenyan person and European person is fineWhy you are not verifying identity by the documents of you? If you have less identity verification document then you can verify with the document of your parents. The verification you are trying to buy means you are trying to something wrong which can be money laundering or something like that.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: whitegold22 on August 12, 2022, 10:30:14 AMAs the subject states. I need someone to very a crypto account for me. Telegram me if you are interested. Any Kenyan person and European person is fineDo you have any good reason you want to a verified account with anyther person's identity? Why don't you use your own ID documents? Or if your dad or mum are aware of it, you can use their own. There has been no two reasons people are requesting to buy crypto verified account than criminal activities that is involved.

comments.author: elonsmask
comments.body: Is this still open? I can help with verifying kenyan accounts

comments.author: dataispower
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on August 15, 2022, 07:53:41 AMQuote from: whitegold22 on August 12, 2022, 10:30:14 AMAs the subject states. I need someone to very a crypto account for me. Telegram me if you are interested. Any Kenyan person and European person is fineDo you have any good reason you want to a verified account with anyther person's identity? Why don't you use your own ID documents? Or if your dad or mum are aware of it, you can use their own. There has been no two reasons people are requesting to buy crypto verified account than criminal activities that is involved.I think you're right, because an account verification don't need any one else for the verification, because if something should happen to the account the in future you will need the attention of the person that gave you his own documents to verify to bring more for clarification. And if that person happened to be retired in the forum as some people i do know in the forum retired, so how will he do to get communication with the person that gives him documents. So nobody supposed to use a document of another to verify his account for security purpose. I concur with you

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: whitegold22 on August 12, 2022, 10:30:14 AMAs the subject states. I need someone to very a crypto account for me. Telegram me if you are interested. Any Kenyan person and European person is fineLike every other user have said, I think you have to state a genuine reason why you need someone else you don't know in person to verify an account for you,Â  if you lack the necessary documents required, you can talk to your parents or other family members, or even close friends to do it for you, why want a person from different country to verify an account for you if what you plan to do with the account is legal?Quote from: elonsmask on September 09, 2022, 05:29:21 PMIs this still open? I can help with verifying kenyan accountsIf you have the slightly idea of the kind of problem helping an unknown person to verify account have put many people into, you would think twice before you consider doing a thing like this, even if the person is goin to pay you handsomely, that money can never be enough to get you out of the sh!t this careless act will get you into, this is if you don't lose your life in the process, so better be careful.
